briefTitle: 18F-ASIS PET/CT Imaging of Tissue Factor Expression In Patients With Primary and Metastastic Cancer
officialTitle: Phase I: PET Imaging of Tissue Factor (TF) Expression in Patients With Primary and Metastastic Cancer Using 18F-ASIS.
conditions: Breast Cancer, Lung Cancer, Pancreatic Cancer, Ovarian Cancer, Cervix Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: 1.Biodistribution of the radiotracer 18F-ASIS estimated by PET
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosed with breast, lung, pancreatic, cervix or ovarian cancer
* Capable of understanding the patient information in Danish and giving full informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy
* Breast-feeding
* Weight above 140 kg
* History of allergic reaction attributable to compounds of similar chemical or biologic composition to 18F-ASIS
